Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens (JJ)
Creation date: 16.09.2003 (SCR4304)
30.01.2014 SH SCR18682 Step1: Changed update INVA_ACTAEXTRAFIN
30.01.2014 SH SCR18682 Step1: Added updates DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCC/H for caculations on debtor level
29.11.2013 SH SCR18524 Step 1. Added group level on INVO_DEBC_NIO, moved part "DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCH < 0" fro R.S. to
G.S. INVO_DEBC_NO and added new part to check max. amount incl. INVA/DCMC updates;
Moved update of CMCD fields from invoice level to client level (calc now with DCMC totals by separate task)
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
03.09.2012 GB SCR17473 Set to 0 some variables if calculated extra financing is negative (in the part All invoices handled)
11.07.2011 SH SCR16595 Changed BCM016C input parameter to alpha
05.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
14.04.2009 SH SCR14516 Fixed problem with update INVA in general currency
06.04.2009 SH SCR14516 Redesigned step 1 "CalcFinanceAmounts"
05.02.2008 AK SCR13343 changes in spec see SCR
31.01.2008 AK SCR13348 fix bug initial mode not allowed in 'ResetCMON_CURRBALWK'
31.01.2008 AK SCR13343 fix bug in task 'SQL: CalcTargetAmountMC(NL)'
03.04.2007 SH SCR12420 Added Step 5
21.07.2006 JJ SCR11613 Step 3 Dropped selection on WKAHANDLINGTYPE
23.01.2006 JJ SCR10078 cont. Fixed bug excluding GSET_MARKCODE(92) from step 1
10/11.01.2006 JJ SCR10078 Added steps 3 and 4
22.12.2005 SH SCR9852 Changed selection of INVO in case of GNRL_CODE = NL
20.12.2005 AK SCR9852 v.TargetAmountMC = sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL - INVO_AWKAI) *
CMCD402_ADVANCEPERC/100 and diferent range INVO_DUEDATE
20.10.2003 JJ SCR4571 co nt. added v.MaxFinance to call BCM016A
17.10.2003 JJ SCR4571 changed calculation booked amount
14.10.2003 JJ SCR4551 changed max finance calculation
01.10.2003 JJ SCR4304 cont. fixed bug in max finance calculation
24.09.2003 JJ SCR4304 cont revised calculation in case of exceeded limit
18.09.2003 JJ SCR4304 cont. fixed bugs
... book changes
-- If calculated extra financing is negative, change to zero
-- Reset variables
... invoice currency
... client currency
... administration currency
-- DEBB_ACTINVAEXTFINACCH < 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVA_ACTAEXTRAFIN) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVA join :1/INVO on INVO_NO = INVA_NO and INVO_DEBC_NO = :3 and INVO_AACTUALH <> 0 where INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' for fetch only
select cast(sum (DCMC_EXTRAFINANCEC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DCMC Where DCMC_ADMNO = :2 and DCMC_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only
select cast(sum (DCMC_EXTRAFINANCEC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum (DCMC_EXTRAFINANCEH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DCMC where DCMC_ADMNO = :2 and DCMC_CLNTNO = :3 and DCMC_MARK_CODE = :4 for fetch only
select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO from :1/INVO where INVO_AACTUALC > 0 and INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE IN(1,2) group by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO order by INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Book extra finance
